entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Milk River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:38 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Milk River 9:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: SSE 37 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:18 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 6:18 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:18 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
